price: Kuma istigifãrin Ibrãhĩm ga ubansa bai kasance ba fãce sabõda wani wa'adi ne da ya ƙulla alƙawarinsa da shi, sa'an nan a lõkacin da ya bayyana a gare shi (Ibrãhĩm) cẽwa lalle ne shĩ (ubansa) maƙiyi ne ga Allah, sai ya barranta daga gare shi. Lalle ne Ibrahim, haƙĩƙa, mai yawan addu'a ne, mai haƙuri.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱسۡتِغۡفَارُ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ لِأَبِيهِ إِلَّا عَن مَّوۡعِدَةٖ وَعَدَهَآ إِيَّاهُ فَلَمَّا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُۥٓ أَنَّهُۥ عَدُوّٞ لِّلَّهِ تَبَرَّأَ مِنۡهُۚ إِنَّ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ لَأَوَّٰهٌ حَلِيمٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
